part_description: Two dark lenses and white arms, angular shape, symmetrical.
internal_interaction_description: The two lenses are connected by a bridge, maintaining a fixed distance. The arms are attached at the outer edges of the lenses, allowing for folding and stability when worn. The angular design provides a modern aesthetic while ensuring the lenses remain aligned.
external_interaction_description: The glasses are designed to be worn on the face, interacting with the nose and ears for support. They can be used to view 3D content, enhancing visual experiences. The arms may fold for convenient storage and portability.
